price: Doa 671 mereka di dalamnya ialah "Subḥānakallāhumma" 672 dan salam penghormatan mereka ialah "Salām" 673. Dan penutup doa mereka ialah "Alḥamdulillāhi Rabbil ʻālamīn  " 674.
arabic: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes:
671.  Maksudnya, puja dan puji mereka kepada Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā. 
672.  Artinya, "Maha Suci Engkau, wahai Tuhan kami".
673.  Artinya, "Sejahtera dari segala bencana".
674.  Artinya, "Segala puji bagi Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā, Tuhan semesta alam".

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: daʿwāhum fīhā sub'ḥānaka al-lahuma wataḥiyyatuhum fīhā salāmun waākhiru daʿwāhum ani al-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
